website_summaries.verdict: This contemporary bedspread is a solid choice for those concerned with style as much as quality.
pros: Pricier model offers excellent breathability for superb temp
Crafted to offer warmth in extreme cold
Box stitch design keeps filling evenly distributed
cons: May not be a good choice for those needing a lightweight comforter in warmer climates

customer_reviews.title: Don't overthink, just buy this comforter.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I spent a couple of hours reading reviews and really overthinking the decision. I couldn't be more happy with the look, feel and especially the price. I would highly recommend this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Although the color is a little lighter than I expected, I love this thing. Really soft, fluffy, and light weight. Not to be too cliche, but it’s pretty much like sleeping with a cloud in your bed. It doesn’t get too hot either, which is a concern I had upon purchasing it. I’d recommend this if you’re looking for a relatively inexpensive comforter. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: CONSIDER A DIFFERENT COMFORTER
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this comforter in Dec 2019. Almost 3 months ago. We were utilizing it for our guest bedroom. We haven’t had any guest sleep with this comforter since purchasing it. We washed it twice since owning the comforter. Yesterday was the second time we washed it and I noticed a hole with the comforter filling coming out. Each time this comforter was washed, it was washed by itself and on delicates. Pretty bummed out that I will need to purchase a new comforter after paying basically $40 for this comforter and it already started to fall apart after 3 months with no usuage by any people.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gem for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! Soft deep color. Throw it in the dryer (no heat) to fluff. However straight out it is still like a feather duvet. Perfect warm weather, with a top sheet. Light not great if you physically need weight to sleep. My own issue is that it is in such limited colors. Plus they need to offer covers. Make the purchase, more bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Zil45

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! I have slept so well since getting it. The other one I was using did not keep me warm...I was always so cold for the first couple hours of sleep. This one keeps me nice and warm, without making me hot. Hopefully it will not be hot in the summer. I haven't washed it yet, but that is one reason I bought it because it is machine washable. I have boxers so I'm washing my bedding often. This was a great priced comforter and I love how fluffy it is.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Ruined after one wash
customer_reviews.text: A section ripped the day I got them. Put them in to wash at the suggested cycle, took it out to find it was ruined.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not as poofy, but still very nice for summer
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty light weight and cool for the summer heat here in California. I like the color. It arrived in a smaller box than I expected. When I opened it, the air had all been sucked out. I had hoped when I removed it that it would puff up and out a little like the picture the seller has. Unfortunelatly, that wasn't the case. I probably wouldn't have spent what I did on a flat comforter. Just be aware when you buy this, that is what your getting. Otherwise, I was impressed with how big it was. Usually any comfoorterr on my cal king bed is really short. This one is very generous in size.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: The best Blanket you will ever own for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was in TRUMP Hotel in Vegas. This bedspread literally is like sleeping on clouds. It isn't uncomfortable in the slightest. Its lightweight, doesn't pill, for the money its worth it. I bought these for my entire house so that I just have to use bleach in case my children decide to stain them and I didn't spend that much plus I got a good quality fabric that is extremely comfortable. I tell my wife whenever we go camping, "Can I just take the blanket and not the sleeping bag" ? She laughs !!
customer_reviews.author: Threepercenter

customer_reviews.title: I'm here to say that I am so happy with my decision
customer_reviews.text: I spent days going back and forth looking at this comforter and hours reviewing the comments. I kept over thinking my decision on whether to make this purchase or not. I'm here to say that I am so happy with my decision. It immediately fluffed up when I took it out of its packaging. It's so soft. I have a queen size bed and bought the king comforter. It fits and hangs perfectly. I'm buying another one for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Spots After Washing
customer_reviews.text: The moment it was received in the mail, it was put in the washer to clean. Before putting it in the washer, someone noticed that there was a loose string. Then, when it came out it had hard dark spots on it and another loose string. The moment you wash it, it no longer looks nice. I can only imagine it falling apart more and more with each wash.
customer_reviews.author: Paugh Family

customer_reviews.title: 100% polyester
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this purchase. I read all this great reviews and got fooled by the product description that doesn't mention this is 100% polyester. This comforter is extremely hot. I don't recommend you to buy if you don't want to wake in a pool of sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Laisp

customer_reviews.title: The best comforter in the world!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so soft and fluffy. It is like sleeping on the clouds of heaven. I seriously have a big problem--- I NEVER want to leave my bed. I haven't had any issues with it tearing or anything like some of the reviews suggest. It will definitely keep you warm in the middle of the winter. I wake up sweating under it if I'm not careful. I love this comforter!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Ledford

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket. It is soft and looks great. I’ve washed it once and put it in the dryer on low with no issues. I have a queen bed and I ordered the king size so it hangs off. Perfect size. I get really hot when I’m sleeping and I was worried this blanket would be too warm, but it’s not. It’s perfect. If you’re on the fence about it, just order it, you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Duvet Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with this comforter. I am highly allergic to Dust Mites and it is hypoallergenic so I don't have to buy another expensive dust mite cover for it. Another great thing about this comforter is that it actually fits my bed nicely. Most of them are to short on each side. I love that it has no feathers as I am highly allergic to them. So no more battling that! Last but not least it is soft and cozy! I am very impressed with this one as I was very skeptical with some of the reviews. Very please to have bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: CariLyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pulled this out of the bag expecting to have to steam iron it to take the wrinkles out but they literally fixed themselves once I put it over the bed. The material is comfy and cozy but not too hot; it seems like it would be good year round (I live in Florida where it’s hot as hell). The color is nice and deep and the stitching looks great. Definitely 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within 5 minutes in the wash
customer_reviews.text: Gentlest, slowest cycle, and cold wash and it still ripped apart. Seemed like good quality, but clearly can't be machine washed like other revieeers have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Size Isn’t Standard
customer_reviews.text: This review is more of a warning. This comforter is not the normal dimensions of most king/California king comforters. I have been unable to find a duvet that is the same size as this comforter. I even went as far as to order the same brand as the comforter and I was still unsuccessful. From what I’ve seen, normal dimensions tend to be 104x90. This comforter is 104x98. I bought this with the intentions of putting a duvet cover over it. If I would have realized that I wouldn’t have been able to find one, I wouldn’t have purchased it. Now, I’m stuck with it. The quality of the comforter is nice, put it should have normal dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Speights

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed with how nice this feels and how warm it is
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a comforter and a down comforter with this comforter. I also bought a duvet cover for it. It’s so luxurious and fluffy! I can’t believe how well I am sleeping since I got this comforter. I never get cold at night and my husband and I are no longer playing tug of war in the night for the blankets! I was very impressed with how nice this feels and how warm it is, without being too hot. It was a great purchase and the gray is positively gorgeous. It gave my bedroom a whole new look.
customer_reviews.author: Pursegal

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews for this item I was scared to wash it but I absolutely will not use sheets/blankets/towels/clothes/etc without washing first. I live in an apartment complex and have shared washer/dryer and was hesitant to use them to wash this comforter but I said f it and did it anyway... Absolutely no problems whatsoever! It dried in one cycle on medium heat, I was prepared for 2 cycles because I have a king size, but it dried in one. There are no loose threads or any blemishes or damage or anything so far.. I haven't slept with it yet but it's very soft and fluffy and I love it..!! I'd recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Black Erhart

customer_reviews.title: The color is off
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, I had a comforter than I accidentally shredded in the washer... so I got a replacement in a different color. I ordered the burgundy, but it’s actually more of an orange-red color and I really don’t like it. I ordered a duvet cover so it’ll be fine, but I am a little frustrated that the color pictured is totally different than the color I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable and will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how this cover would hold up. We have had it about a year. I wash it in standard size washer and dryer. Three dogs sleep on there with us. It still looks as nice as the day we got it. We love that it is warm in winter and light weight in summer. It don’t make you feel like you are buried under a thick pile of blankets. It doesn’t not have a bunch of strings, snags or fading either like most comforters do when washed a lot and have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this comforter!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this comforter. I got the California king and it’s huge! It covers my bed perfectly and I love the ashy grey color. I had to wash it recently and it fit in my standard size washer and dryer. Took two full cycles of each but came out perfectly - not clumpy as I was fearing. It’s very soft, not too warm, and doesn’t hold in cold when you first get under them. For the price, I’m very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: best comforter out there!
customer_reviews.text: this is the most amazing comforter i’ve ever slept with and I can’t believe it was so cheap! the grey color is very nice and i can’t believe how soft and nice it is. my favorite thing too is that the fabric doesn’t collect hair. our old comforters were always collecting hair. we have cats and dogs and this comforter so far doesn’t have any hair on it, amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn D

customer_reviews.title: Softest Comforter Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in August - before I got a puppy. I just opened it and washed it. It washed well, but took several times to dry it on low as they suggested. It is the softest comforter I have ever owned! I absolutely love it! Ii have a Queen size bed - but I bought a Cal-King! It is just perfect for both of us and our puppy! I am probably going to purchase a couple more as Christmas gifts for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: Probably my best amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Like sleeping on a cloud! Not too warm for this SC spring time but it will be tested this summer for sure. Very soft! Ordered the blush pink and true to color. Sadly pet hair is now stuck all over it and it’s turned gray haha. Have no washed yet but no loose threads or rips so far! Great bargain! I have a queen bed but I wanted extra blanket cause my box spring is y’all and I wanted to hide it. The king size did this perfectly and it does not drag onto the floor! So nice!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: nice quality, bright burgundy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality - midweight. It's a smidge lighter than it looked in the picture - definitely burgundy, but a pretty light version of burgundy. Feels soft and my teen loves it. I feel good about it - especially because I'd been concerned it couldn't be that great considering it was so inexpensive. I should add that the amount of plastic packaging they used to ship it is ridiculous!!! Literally a thick plastic shrink-wrapped bag placed inside another really thick plastic zipped bag. Why oh why? One is plenty folks! Waste not want not and all that...
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V.

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft blanket
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was faster than expected. The quality and softness of the blanket was great. The only problem I found was it kept me a little to warm. I love it cold. But my wife on the other hand loved it since she wasn’t freezing at night. Over all great blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: The gray looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is very soft. The gray looks just like the picture. I am surprised by the people saying this comforter is light. I actually gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it seems to trap heat easily (so if that's what you want then it's perfect). I unfortunately always am hot when I sleep despite keeping the temperature in my house at 60, so this comforter is a bit too hot for me. However, the fabric is very fluffy and soft. It looks really good with the bamboo sheet set I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It's so fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I love this! It is so soft and comfortable. I bought it to use on my boat but , I love it so much, I may take it home and put it on my bed! That way, I won't have to go so long without it! The color make me very happy. This made for a perfect Zen decor!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfortable, cozy comforter that wouldn’t break the bank. I have dogs that sleep with me, so it needed to wash well and be durable. I’ve been using this a few months now - it’s good for all weather and washes and dries nicely. The dogs have jumped on it and it hasn’t ripped. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria McClure

customer_reviews.title: in good condition. Was vaccuum sealed inside the packaging which ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, in good condition. Was vacuum sealed inside the packaging which I liked. As soon as it was opened it fluffed up quickly and nicely. It is super warm without being uncomfortable, very soft, color is perfect. Would buy from them again for sure. Update: After washing (I used regular settings) some of the stuffing had come out/ was coming out. Was able to fix it fairly easily, but would be better to use on delicate settings. I always wash regular due to my dogs being on the bed. Also note this attracts hair VERY easily, glad I bought a dark color.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: looks good; fits both a full size and queen size bed very well. Appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it two days. It came to the house about 6 hours after I ordered it!!!! Looks beautiful and really warm and light weight. However, the real test will be when it is washed a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Love the Quality and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so fluffy and soft. I was able to use it straight from the box because it fluffed out so beautifully with hardly any wrinkles. The weight is light on my body, but it also keeps me very warm without the addition of a blanket to my bed. I'm very impressed by the comfort and quality of this product and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ransomed

customer_reviews.title: Fav comforter ever
customer_reviews.text: I got one and went back and got 3 more. Best comforter ever. A lil warmer than expected but nice and floppy like I wanted feels like dream wrapped in a hug :o)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany10

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter can in a vacuum sealed bag, so it needed to be fluffed up with a tumble dry. It is super soft. It’s a little warmer than I wanted, but I get hot easily when I sleep. However, it is very soft and cuddle worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much!!! Sooo soft!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this comforter so much we had to order a second one after my son got sick all over it. We should have tossed it in the washing machine but i didn’t want to deal with it and didn’t want to torture the dry cleaners so we just ordered another because it is wonderful and perfect soft and fluffy and fits perfectly over his full bed.
customer_reviews.author: Fan of good service

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware- switch and bait product
customer_reviews.text: The product I received does not look like the picture. The squares are completely different and it is far from luxury. The picture shows large squres and on mine it is outlined and then has small squares. It’s paper thin material and ripped in 4-5 sections just from me opening up the package. It’s very thin and light weight, feels like something from Walmart. I think the product was switched since it does not look like the picture shown or like other pictures from buyers with 4+ stars.
customer_reviews.author: katyk

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and super warm!
customer_reviews.text: Great fluffy comforter! The fabric is very light and will puff up nicely with a few shakes or a run through the dryer on a light, no heat setting. Queen fits great on a Full bed and just covers the sides of the mattress. The black color looks great. It is extremely warm so expect to be either very cozy or too hot in it, I don't use it as my main sleeping blanket unless it's really chilly. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much I bought one for every family member!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the house loves my comforter and steals it off my bed. I had to order two more. They are lovely colors (I have the sage), super soft and comfy, and durable. Updated, 11/2019: I had to buy two more (so now we have five) because other family members love it so much! I do not recommend the aqua color, however. It does not look like a color that a comforter should be. Very odd.
customer_reviews.author: celiza

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Best comforter I’ve ever used. I got it when I moved to the Caribbean and it was perfect! I was able to cover with the comforter while sleeping even though it was hot and humid. It’s also a really pretty color that went well with the grey sheets I got. The only problem with it is that after washing it, the filling on the corner squares got lumpy, but the rest of the comforter was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a blanket.
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be way better than Ihad hoped it would be. it's very warm, light and easy to wash. I get cold very easily and have been known to use two blankets. but I only need this one. (I live in California though, so keep that in mind. You might need two if you live in Alaska, or Nebraska.)
customer_reviews.author: iguy

customer_reviews.title: ... have gave it a 0 the quality was very poor in the color totally did not match the
customer_reviews.text: If this had a choice 0 through 5 I would have gave it a 0 the quality was very poor in the color totally did not match the picture
customer_reviews.author: Alan LePage

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Warm
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect gray to match my other bedding. It's fairly lightweight and well constructed. But for me it is way too warm as an all season blanket. It has a bit more poly fill than I would expect for a blanket described as such. I look forward to using it in winter, but even in air conditioning with a fan it was too warm for summer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roe

customer_reviews.title: Stop Looking, this is the one! Like another reviewer said. I completely agree!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! I have washed it 1x so far. Still great if not better after the wash.. I have to be cold when I sleep. This blanket is lightweight to the touch but it gets warms quickly..so I would say it is more on a heavyweight side... I still love it..hard to explain but it is just right. I think this does a bit of both.. gives alot of warmth to not have to use a heater but can be flipped for coldness from time to time once it gets too warm for comfort if that makes sense. Overall it was a great purchase.. And the color matched exactly with my decor. Plan on buying another one day.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Salgado

customer_reviews.title: ... and I would wonder how they always had really nice and comfortable and quality made comforters
customer_reviews.text: I would always sleep at hotels and I would wonder how they always had really nice and comfortable and quality made comforters.I finally looked and found the name brand, so I found this comforter online and got one and it is the nicest one I have ever bought!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: KING COMFORTER
customer_reviews.text: Bought burgandy King comforter. It's a red/burgandy. Comes shrink wrapped in small box. Fluffs up well. Sides are really short and barely covers the sheets on the King comforter, otherwise, nice CASUAL lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zenya Christa

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: So soft and comfortable ! I would buy this again ! It’s not hot or heavy yet keeps me warm . I feel like I sleep better . It’s a great price too . I was surprised how nice it was . Honestly the best feeling comforter I’ve ever had .
customer_reviews.author: SHONDA HILLER

customer_reviews.title: But the California king if you have a king
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad comforter for the price. Decent fabric, the color doesn’t match the photo though. It’s a lot lighter in person, also I ordered a California king because the king size tend to run small and that was a good decision. It would’ve been way short if I ordered the king
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is stationed in Japan and the comforters at the store on base were $60 and up. So I turned to amazon. This comforter is so nice. We have a queen sized bed and love to wrap the blankets around ourselves so I bought a king sized comforter. I love it! It’s light and soft. My husband is very happy with it and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Radel

customer_reviews.title: Not thick. Not "all season" warmth.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this item as I didn't feel it was an accurate description of an "all season" comforter. The quality was fine, but it is EXTREMELY thin. I think for maybe mid/late summer this would be ideal, but I found myself using it during the month of March (heat off in bedroom) and was shivering. Also I didn't quite like how thin it looked on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if I would like it but turned out I loved it... it's light weight, but keeps you warm. Over warm sometimes. Super soft. I don't like heavy blankets and this is perfect. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: terri erfourth

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I searched through pages and pages of search results, looking for the ‘perfect’ comforter before finally deciding on this one. I have to say...I have no regrets! This comforter is such a pretty color, and it’s extremely soft. It was a little bit thicker than I expected, but I ended up liking that about it! Most definitely worth the price, I’d recommend it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Colsten

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight does not mean good
customer_reviews.text: Has ripped in 4 different spots. Wouldn’t waste my money again on this company. I figured since it had mostly positive reviews that people were complaining over nothing on the negative reviews but this blanket is falling apart and has been since two months after having it and has only gotten worse
customer_reviews.author: giavonee rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality comforter
customer_reviews.text: Great quality comforter. For $35 this is a great comforter. I got the dark gray color and it looks great, very comfortable and it fluffed up when unpacked. True to color and size (I got the queen) and was delivered as promised. Good quality comforter.
customer_reviews.author: wood0504

customer_reviews.title: Definitely comfortable, but not a normal feather duvet
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter but it is just that a comforter. It feels no different than a regular cotton comforter. I have a very expensive duvet that is goose feathers and they are completely different. The blanket is definitely lightweight and very comfortable. But if you’re looking for a goose feather down duvet this is not the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable comforter we own!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our guest room and now my husband yells at me that this is "the comfiest comforter in the house and isn't for us" hahaha. This is warm and cozy (exactly what I wanted our guests to have!
customer_reviews.author: Sib

customer_reviews.title: PRACTICAL BUT COVER IT UP
customer_reviews.text: The wrinkles won't come out, so it looks like a crumpled sleeping bag rather than a comforter. That is the only issue I have with it. I covered it with a really nice blanket so I don't see the awful wrinkles that make it look like I don't know how to wash or iron anything. It is very soft, very lightweight, and it keeps me warm at night, but not HOT. A little disappointed, but as long as you have a nice blanket to cover it, you won't know it looks like five kids rolled around in it and played tug of war with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think twice. Buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so comfy. You hear phrases like soft as a cloud thrown around all over the bedding market, but I love this blanket. The price is right, and it’s been so comfy since we bought it. I can see us using this blanket for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Barner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice goose down alternative!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this would be as nice as goose down but find it was the next best thing. It is more affordable. I haven't had it long enough to give a fair durability rating and have not washed it yet. I think it will be fine as it seems to be well sewn. I really like the drapey rich look it has. For the cost and if you like this look, it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: good for the price, but with only 5 days of use, all the seams are lose and it has a little hole. not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wrong color description
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comforter, it is not what was advertised. Was a bright green instead of sage, product does not look as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Jaiden McNeal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comforter!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable material! When I first got it, it was quite comically thick. Its "deflated" a bit but it's still a great confortable. Very soft, and will keep you quite warm. It really is a quality comforter and feels like a product that would cost much more than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: very soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it . The comforter is light weight which is great because we live in Florida . The comforter also feels cold which is another great factor for Florida weather.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wilson Lor

customer_reviews.title: Cal King Comforter Charcoal grey AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time and was well packaged. It was in one of the vacuum type bags so the product was compact. I opened it and was surprised at how heavy the comforter actually was. It’s very soft and doesn’t move around on my bed due to the weight of the blanket. I love this one and would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this comforter! The fabric is so light and soft. The design is simple with ckean, modern lines. I have a queen bed and I ordered the king so I don't have to deal with a bed skirt. My only concern, and this is entirely my fault, is how pet friendly this light color will be. It's a bit lighter than the picture but the color is gorgeous and exactly what I wanted. Over the moon thrilled!!
customer_reviews.author: L.J. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick
customer_reviews.text: Soft, thick. These are too hot for my husband but perfect for me. We live in Arizona. For me its nice in the winter but will not be able to use this in the summer. It was a little lighter in color than it looked in the picture. Not quiet dark, yet not light. It is a shade lighter then the rest of my bedding and they are all dark gray.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great. The Color is not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the feeling, texture and quality of this comforter. It's wonderful. I wish I would have ordered a different color. The ivory is more of a light lemon (with a lot of yellow in it) not the off white I was looking for. I will use this as a filler and purchase a duvet color that is more like the color I had hoped. It's hard to know what color you're getting online. But this is a great quality comforter and I would highly suggest it. Just be aware the Ivory is very yellow.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Works for Us
customer_reviews.text: Peachy pink color...but very nice...warm and very soft.Ive washed several times and it washed very well. WE BOUGHT A KING AND IT FITS VERY WELL. I DIDNT THINK IT WOULD BE SO GREAT SEEING THE PRICE,BUT IT IS NICE. MORE PEACH THAN PINK,AT LEAST THE ONE THEY SENG ME WAS.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift...they loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My son and significant other loved this...because it was down alternative, no allergy risk. It was washed upon receipt...laundered well. It went into immediate use. They are so pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kline

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great deal but you get what you pay for. The second time through the washer on a “Rinse and Drain” cycle it tore apart. If you do buy it anyway make sure to wash it alone because the color runs very heavily into not just white sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not pink!
customer_reviews.text: Not pink!! More of an apricot or peach color. I can not comment as to quality since we didn’t even get it out of the shrink wrap packaging. I needed pink and was hoping the other reviews that said it wasn’t really pink might be wrong or that I would get a pink one.... anyway the other reviews are correct this is NOT PINK. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: This is a luxurious comforter!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, thick, and soft comforter. It's WAY more than I expected for the price. It is definitely hotel quality, it's beautiful, soft, and almost like cuddling with a cloud. I love it, and I highly recommend this comforter. The color is rich and luxurious. Wonderful product, wonderful transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Julie O'Kon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wonderful wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love hotel beds! It may sound crazy but there have been times I’ve paid Hilton prices just to sleep under there comforters and on top of their sheets lol so I ordered this. One word.... Amazing! Hotel Quality! I love it! So soft and it feels like it is literally hugging me. I love the weight on it. Great material amazing price and quality. My husband loves it too. We slept great last night!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Terrible color
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a rich sage green, you are out of luck! This is so mis-represented on this site. I opened the package to a sort of light lime green comforter. Feels nice - looks awful.
customer_reviews.author: F.Lea

customer_reviews.title: Very dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I washed the comfortor twice and the seams started tearing and stuffing was sticking out. I really liked it, but it appears the quality is pretty bad. Update: They offered me $30 to take down this review, but I told them that if they wanted me to take it down they need to send me a new one and we'll see if it holds up. Waiting on a response at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stetina

customer_reviews.title: Beware: False information in description
customer_reviews.text: The description says this is a comforter with two sham. I received this today and there were no shams included. Although I ordered the comforter in a king size, it is too narrow for a king size bed. Will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay, dont wash it
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, thin and decently warm, would recommend for warmer weather. Mine was ruined after I washed in my large washing machine, it was tore up and I had to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Always Review My Orders

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this comforter on my bed for a month and love it. It is soft and warm. I washed it first and didn't have any problem with seams coming out. I got the Navy Blue and was so happy with it I ordered a Burgundy for the guest bedroom. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sister

customer_reviews.title: Glorified sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: While the color is great and the thickness is somewhat fluffy I cannot really give this a good review as it does not keep me very warm which is fine for the heat of the summer but not the rest of the year. The material also feels really slick like a sleeping bag and I cannot seem to get the wrinkles out even after washing and drying it. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Krystene

customer_reviews.title: Soft, fluffy. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Its soft, fluffy. I am extremely happy with it. I haven't had it long, but for the price it's pretty incredible. Absolutely recommend based on the feel alone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds up great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this comforter daily and washing it weekly. Still looks new! Did I mention that I wash and dry every week! I purchased in black. Looks like they don’t carry black anymore?
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, soft & warm comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is great! It’s super soft and fluffy and VERY comfortable to sleep with. The only complaint I have is that it is on the warmer side. I tend to get hot while I’m sleeping and I’ve had to take the comforter off of me a few times at night. It’s great for winter but probably wouldn’t work for warmer months, even though it states it’s all season. I definitely recommend it though!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey S.

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when ordering this because of some other reviews but I love it! It's a light weight fabric but definitely keeps you warm. I ordered a king size for my queen bed and I'm so glad I did. Have had a few minor stains on the fabric and literally was able to wipe away with a baby wipe. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Britney R.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, not dense.
customer_reviews.text: Decently warm. Light weight. Interior extremely fluffy. Not how i prefer it but not the product's problem. I prefer far more density. This has none.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Frog

customer_reviews.title: Color isn't on point
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one in the dark grey and it is very very light grey. Stinks, because it doesn't match well with the rest of my color scheme in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleFilly

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I got the box - I figured it would be a huge box completely stuffed with this blanket. NOPE! Tiny box, I got so nervous that I had ordered the wrong thing! Opened the box and plastic and it basically exploded. Super soft blanket, no funny smells, and super light weight - but totally warm. The color is way off, I ordered the gray and it is defiantly blue
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: There is a dirty footprint on my comforter
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this comforter so badly. It is the perfect size for my bed and is so soft. Unfortunately when I got it it was covered in what I believe to be dirt. There is what I believe to be a dirty footprint on it. I have washed it four times and still can’t seem to get the dirt out. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, more vibrant and light green in person. The quality is as expected like any normal comforter, though stains from anything (makeup, food, etc. I basically live in my bed) doesn’t come off for a few washes and oil based things leave a really nice permanent stain.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good product, fast delivery, safe choice. Comfortable but would not say that it is any 'cooler' or better for summer temperatures over others.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of the same size and color and one felt almost like plastic. 2020 Update: This manufacturer of this garbage product keeps emailing us to take down this review for $30 in compensation. I’d completely avoid it and question any positive reviews. They should spend their money on fixing this crap product. We trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Loved this, until I washed it.... The comforter tore and stuffing was everywhere..... tried to contact the seller, but no response!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda levi

customer_reviews.title: Color was off - returning
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the green color thinking it'd be more muted like the picture. But it came to us as a light green. Seemed nice and soft, just didn't like the color.
customer_reviews.author: EstradaFam

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than anticipated. Have a queen-size bed, and a deep plum comforter (king-size to avoid the demon "bed skirt thing) that I LOVE, but is removed at night. Wanted a comforter that wouldn't show under the plum. EXCELLENT! It works far better than I had hoped for. Great quality. Looks great even w/o the larger comforter set!
customer_reviews.author: O.M.O.1101

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Very, very soft material. Feels great on your skin. Usable in cold or hot temps. When it's cool 68 degrees or less it keeps the right warm temp underneath or if you are too warm the material has a cool feeling on the outside to lie on.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P

customer_reviews.title: Light, warm, clean, soft comforter!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is great! I have only had it a couple of days so I haven't washed it. But, the quality looks spectacular. No rips or frays in seams. IT covers my whole bed. The color is exactly as described. There is no weird smell in the packaging. And most of all - it's light but warm! I am pleasantly surprised. My room is in the basement and my roommates keep the temperature at 67F upstairs during the day so it gets freezing in the basement. However, this comforter keeps me toasty all night even without the use of another blanket. The microfiber material is soft and comfortable. I am very pleased with this blanket and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina B

customer_reviews.title: So comphy!
customer_reviews.text: It feels so fluffy and soft even though it's not super thick. I like the soft green color I got. It washes well and so far the fillings haven't clumped oddly after about 6 months of washes and use.
customer_reviews.author: Bryna Starling

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty and everything And comfortable, but it’s just not long enough. I was expecting something like in the picture and my bed is not like super tall or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a huge pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This the softest comforter I've ever had the pleasure of laying on. Reading the reviews I didn't even chance putting it in the wash machine because just based on the thinness and it being so lightweight. The threads can unravel really easy and get hooked during a spin cycle. Aside from that the feel from laying on this is like a huge pillow. Oh and I also went up a size and got a king comforter for my queen mattress. Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: R_Channay

customer_reviews.title: Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely been through many washes (pet owner) and the quality of the comforter is just like when it was purchased! It's super warm and soft. The sage is a nice color too!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: We have been using by itself and it just has a funny plasticy feel. So we ordered a duvet so we will see how it holds up as an insert 🤞🏻
customer_reviews.author: deborah kristensen

product_meta.title: Beckham Hotel Collection 1300 Series - All Season - Luxury Goose Down Alternative Comforter - Hypoallergenic - Queen/Full - Gray
product_meta.description:
Size:Queen/Full| Color:GrayThe Beckham Luxury Linens All Season Down Alternative Comforter is the softest and lightest comforter on the market! You can use our comforter as a duvet insert, or as a stand-alone comforter. It is perfect for whatever your bedding needs are. Our comforter is a masterpiece! It is crafted with durable hems and precise stitching giving it excellent longevity. Use it for years to come! It is hypoallergenic providing a barrier to protect against dust mites, mold, allergens, and mildew. Plus, it is machine washable! 

Don’t wait. Purchase your own Beckham Luxury Linens All Season Down Alternative Comforter NOW!
feature_bullets: SOFT & LIGHTWEIGHT – The Beckham Luxury Linens All Season Down Alternative Comforter is the most soft and lightweight comforter on the market! You can use our comforter as a duvet insert, or as a stand-alone comforter. It is perfect for whatever your bedding needs are.

EXPERT CRAFTSMANSHIP & DESIGN - Sleep in extreme comfort! Our comforter is a masterpiece. It is crafted with durable hems and precise stitching that gives it excellent longevity. Use it for years to come!
HYPOALLERGENIC - The hypoallergenic material provides a barrier to protect against dust mites, mold, allergens, and mildew. It is the perfect choice for those who suffer from allergies and/or asthma!

MACHINE WASHABLE - Not only is our all season down comforter amazing, but it is also easy to care for! No need to take it to the dry cleaners, as it is machine washable in a gentle cycle with cold water. Simply sun dry or low tumble dry the comforter.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - We are so confident in the quality of our product that we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee! If you are unsatisfied, simply contact us to return the product for a full refund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,130 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
